Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks.

Note: Color/Design may change subjective to stock availability | Product descriptions:

Welcome to the new NBT Grinder! This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. We also want you to know that you're getting the new NBT experience so there have been a few more added features to help prevent counterfeiting and improve your overall grinding experience.

Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Razor sharp Diamond Cutting Blades for extreme efficiency. Stainless steel pollen screen allows for only the finest pollen to fall to the bottom catch. Powerful Neodymium Magnets for incredible closure. Thin poly ring around top grinding section, for smooth grinding and no friction. Comes with protective pouch!

Features:

Cool NBT logo design
Pollen filter
Lexan O-ring
Scraper
Strong magnet
Pollen collecting compartment

Package Includes:

1 x NBT B-29 Art Decoration Metal Grinder 50mm 4xParts
1 x Drawstring bag

How to use:

Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your ground tobacco

name: nz-scale-calibration-weight-10gm
details:
How to calibrate your scale: Turn on the scale.
Press and hold the [M] key until the LCD display "CAL”, release the [M] key.
Press [M] key again, the display will show "CAL" followed by the required calibration weight value.
Place the required calibration weight on the centre of the platform, the display will show "PASS" then return to the normal weighing mode.
Calibration is complete! You can turn off the scale. GET FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $50.00.| 
If you own a Precise Digital Scale, you will want to maintain its accuracy. All scales require calibration from time to time. With the calibration weight, it will enable you to check and adjust the balance of your scale, ensuring that you get the most accurate measurement every time.| How to calibrate your scale:

Turn on the scale.
Press and hold the [M] key until the LCD display "CAL”, release the [M] key.
Press [M] key again, the display will show "CAL" followed by the required calibration weight value.
Place the required calibration weight on the centre of the platform, the display will show "PASS" then return to the normal weighing mode.
Calibration is complete! You can turn off the scale.

BATTERIES MAY EXPLODE, BURN, OR CAUSE A FIRE IF MISUSED OR MISHANDLED
Usage of batteries is AT YOUR OWN RISK!

DO NOT short circuit intentionally or unintentionally

KEEP AWAY from metal/conductive objects to prevent short-circuiting
DO NOT use if PVC wrapper or terminal insulator is damaged or torn
DO NOT use if the battery is damaged in any way
DO NOT over-charge or charge above the maximum voltage rating
DO NOT over-discharge or exceed the continuous discharge rating
DO NOT modify, disassemble, puncture, cut, crush, or incinerate
DO NOT expose to liquids or high temperatures
DO NOT solder onto the battery
DO NOT use force to install
DO NOT install backward or reverse orientation.
ONLY use within the manufacturer’s specifications.
KEEP AWAY from pets and children.
ALWAYS charge in or on a fire-proof surface and never leave batteries charging unattended.
ONLY use a smart charger designed for this specific type of battery.
DO NOT mix and match brands and models, old and new, used and unused batteries.
STOP immediately if while charging/storing/using the battery it emits an unusual smell, feels extremely hot, changes color or shape, or appears abnormal in any way.
It is your responsibility to determine that your charger or device is functioning properly.
If exposed to battery electrolyte, flush with water immediately and contact a physician or emergency services.

Wait for Results| Wait 5 minutes to read the results shown on the test strips.| Do not read results after 10 minutes.| 3. Interpret Results| Follow the instructions on this page to interpret the test strips.| | How to Read Results| Negative Result| If both the "C" (Control) line and the "T" (Test) line appear, it is a Negative result. Even if the "T" line is seen faintly.| Invalid Result| If the "C" (Control) line does not show up, results are considered Invalid.| Positive Result| If only the "C" (Control) line appears the test result is Positive. CLIA waived, FDA Cleared and Forensic Use Only options available
For Non-Invasive, On-the-Spot Screening
Thermometer style interpretation
Built-in Quality Control Mechanism
Qualitative Results in 5 minutes GET FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $50.00.| 
Our dip card urine drug test kits are an affordable solution for all of your drug testing needs. Up to 99% accurate, these dip card options are dependable and reliable. Please note, that cups are necessary for these types of tests.| Features:

CLIA waived, FDA Cleared and Forensic Use Only options available
For Non-Invasive, On-the-Spot Screening
Thermometer style interpretation
Built-in Quality Control Mechanism
Qualitative Results in 5 minutes

Collection Procedure

1. Collect the Specimen

Collect at least 30 mL of urine in a cup and then place the card with the test strips exposed in the sample.

2. Wait for Results

Wait 5 minutes to read the results shown on the test strips.

Do not read results after 10 minutes.

3. Interpret Results

Follow the instructions on this page to interpret the test strips.

How to Read Results

Negative Result If both the "C" (Control) line and the "T" (Test) line appear, it is a Negative result. Even if the "T" line is seen faintly. Invalid Result If the "C" (Control) line does not show up, results are considered Invalid. Positive Result If only the "C" (Control) line appears the test result is Positive.

details:

The ONYX color is reminiscent of black lava rock, which perfectly matches the VOLCANO's iconic shape. The high-quality powder coating makes the cone even more scratch-resistant, and the matte black makes for a strong appearance of extravagance. There's no question that the proven long-lasting quality from STORZ & BICKEL continues with this limited ONYX edition.  GET FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $50.00.| Fearless, bold and daring. The new limited VOLCANO ONYX edition is an absolute eye-catcher - stylish, bold and daring. The ONYX color is reminiscent of black lava rock, which perfectly matches the VOLCANO's iconic shape. The high-quality powder coating makes the cone even more scratch-resistant, and the matte black makes for a strong appearance of extravagance. There's no question that the proven long-lasting quality from STORZ & BICKEL continues with this limited ONYX edition.| Product Specification: 
Volcano Devices come with a shapely, brushed metal cone. Care was taken to use flavorless materials that are food safe. Both the high-performance heating cartridge and the strong air pump can withstand the toughest stresses and strains.
An independent temperature fuse, air filter and silencer are naturally included in Volcano, as is a specially designed aluminium heat exchanger, which brings the air both cleanly and reliably to the desired temperature.
The well-known VOLCANO CLASSIC equipped with the new innovative EASY VALVE Starter Set, which features an optimized filling chamber. Valve balloons and mouthpieces are maintenance-free and always connected ready to use.
Optimum treatment of the active ingredients reduces the development of harmful substances and odours to a minimum. This means that even non-smokers find the device enjoyable.
A further advantage of the VOLCANO is the exploitation of active ingredients, being 3-4 times greater when compared with smoking, an aspect which makes the investment in the device pay for itself in the shortest time possible.
The temperature of the air fluctuates between the declared value in order of the heating and cool off process of the heat exchanger always around ± 9°F (5°C). So for example at grade 6 between 365°-383°F (185°-195°C)
The temperature was measured (when the air was streaming) in the middle of the filling chamber at the lower screen with an fast reacting, electronic thermometer.
Cellulose (organic material or plant material) has a point of spontaneous combustion at 455°F (235°C) and higher.
Tested and certified product safety and quality
Temperature can be set
between 266° and 446°F (130° and 230°C)
Robust, completely electromechanical design
Three Months warranty
Temperature accuracy ± 9°F (5°C)
Tens of thousands sold

details:

Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Razor sharp Diamond Cutting Blades for extreme efficiency. Stainless steel pollen screen allows for only the finest pollen to fall to the bottom catch. Powerful Neodymium Magnets for incredible closure. Thin poly ring around top grinding section, for smooth grinding and no friction. Comes with protective pouch!| Features:| Package Includes:| How to use:|   Cool NBT logo design
Pollen filter
Lexan O-ring
Scraper
Strong magnet
Pollen collecting compartment| 1 x NBT Skull 4xParts
1 x Drawstring bag| Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco
Now your grinded tobacco are ready to be smoked GET FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $50.00.| Welcome to the new NBT Grinder! This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Note: Color may change subjective to stock availability **| Product descriptions:

Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Razor sharp Diamond Cutting Blades for extreme efficiency. Stainless steel pollen screen allows for only the finest pollen to fall to the bottom catch. Powerful Neodymium Magnets for incredible closure. Thin poly ring around top grinding section, for smooth grinding and no friction. Comes with protective pouch!

Features:

Cool NBT logo design
Pollen filter
Lexan O-ring
Scraper
Strong magnet
Pollen collecting compartment

Package Includes:

1 x NBT Skull 4xParts
1 x Drawstring bag

How to use:

Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco
Now your grinded tobacco are ready to be smoked

ONLY use within the manufacturer’s specifications.

Calibration:

Turn on the scale.
Press and hold the [M] key untill the LCD display “CAL” , release the [M] key.
Press [M] key again, the display will show “CAL” followed by the required calibration weight value.
Place the required calibration weight on the center of the platform, the display will show “PASS” then return to the normal weighing mode.

Calibration is complete! You can turn off the scale.

Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks.


Note: Color may change subjective to stock availability **| Product descriptions:

Welcome to the new NBT Grinder! This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. We also want you to know that you’re getting the new NBT experience so there have been a few more added features to help prevent counterfeiting and improve your overall grinding experience.

Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Razor sharp Diamond Cutting Blades for extreme efficiency. Stainless steel pollen screen allows for only the finest pollen to fall to the bottom catch. Powerful Neodymium Magnets for incredible closure. Thin poly ring around top grinding section, for smooth grinding and no friction. Comes with protective pouch!

Features:

Cool NBT logo design
Pollen filter
Lexan O-ring
Scraper
Strong magnet
Pollen collecting compartment


Package Includes:

1 x NBT Grinder 60mm 3 parts
1 x Drawstring bag

How to use:

Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco

Pollen collecting compartment| 1 x NBT Grinder 63mm 4 parts
1 x Drawstring bag| Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)

This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks.


Note: Color may change subjective to stock availability **| Product descriptions:

Welcome to the new NBT Grinder! This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. We also want you to know that you’re getting the new NBT experience so there have been a few more added features to help prevent counterfeiting and improve your overall grinding experience.

Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Razor sharp Diamond Cutting Blades for extreme efficiency. Stainless steel pollen screen allows for only the finest pollen to fall to the bottom catch. Powerful Neodymium Magnets for incredible closure. Thin poly ring around top grinding section, for smooth grinding and no friction. Comes with protective pouch!

Features:

Cool NBT logo design
Pollen filter
Lexan O-ring
Scraper
Strong magnet
Pollen collecting compartment


Package Includes:

1 x NBT Grinder 63mm 4 parts
1 x Drawstring bag

How to use:

Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco

Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco

Welcome to the new NBT Grinder! This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. We also want you to know that you're getting the new NBT experience so there have been a few more added features to help prevent counterfeiting and improve your overall grinding experience.

Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Razor sharp Diamond Cutting Blades for extreme efficiency. Stainless steel pollen screen allows for only the finest pollen to fall to the bottom catch. Powerful Neodymium Magnets for incredible closure. Thin poly ring around top grinding section, for smooth grinding and no friction. Comes with protective pouch!

Features:

Cool NBT logo design
Pollen filter
Lexan O-ring
Scraper
Strong magnet
Pollen collecting compartment

Package Includes:

1 x NBT Grinder 63mm 4 parts
1 x Drawstring bag

How to use:

Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco

name: smoka-flint-vaporizer
details:
SMOKA Flint Vaporizer will heat up in 10-30s to produce smooth, soft vapor from any dry herb material with its convection heating method. The small, stainless steel filling chamber of the SMOKA Flint Vaporizer is enough for five to seven hits using one of two modes, Session or On Demand, that are easily adjusted with a few clicks of its three buttons. The SMOKA Flint Vaporizer gives you full temperature control (100-220°C), 45-60 minute run time that you keep dry herb vaping. The magnetic Flint Mouthpiece even comes with a built-in stir/packing tool for easy cleaning of the light-weight Flint Dry Herb Vaporizer.| Specifications:| Includes: 150 x 26.6 x 23.8mm

name: nbt-biodegradable-hm4-grinder-2xparts
details:
Welcome to the new NBT Grinder! This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. We also want you to know that you're getting the new NBT experience so there have been a few more added features to help prevent counterfeiting and improve your overall grinding experience.
| Note: Color may change subjective to stock availability **| Package Includes:| How to use: 1 x NBT Biodegradable Grinder 2 parts| Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco GET FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $50.00.| Welcome to the new NBT Grinder! This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. We also want you to know that you're getting the new NBT experience so there have been a few more added features to help prevent counterfeiting and improve your overall grinding experience.


Note: Color may change subjective to stock availability **

Package Includes:

1 x NBT Biodegradable Grinder 2 parts

How to use:

Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco|

name: resinate-cleaning-solution-4oz
details:
When looking for the perfect cleaning solution, how can you be sure what will work best for you? Is Resinate Cleaning Solution safe to use on Glass, Pyrex Glass, Metal, or Ceramic? Resinate Cleaning Solution takes the guesswork out of the equation and delivers an instant abrasive formula that will clean, sterilize and disinfect ANY surface on contact! Resinate offers a solution that is earth friendly, biodegradable and contains NO VOC’s or alcohol. Resinate Cleaning Solution uses only the finest granules to help remove the resin quickly and easily!| HOW TO USE: SHAKE RESINATE BOTTLE THOROUGHLY
POUR RESINATE INTO ITEM BEING CLEANED: MAKE SURE THERE IS AN EVEN DISTRIBUTION OF CRYSTALS AND LIQUID :
COVER ALL OPENINGS OF ITEM AND SHAKE FOR 1 MINUTE.
REPEATEDLY AND THOROUGHLY RINSE

name: smok-morph-3-kit
details:
Smok Morph 3 Vape Kit leveraging on the high-rated 230W dual working modes, VW and TC, dual external 18650 batteries equipment and 2.0A Type-C charging. The Dual 18650 batteries (Not Included) are credited with the higher power output, increased battery life and enhanced safety of Morph 3. Just switch working modes to multiply the fun, offer great flexibility and versatility, allowing vapers to adapt Morph 3 to a wide range of situations and purposes. While vaping, the real-time wattage will automatically fit the current battery life with proper level to lengthen the enduring and maintain a stable output. The 0.96-inch TFT screen allows you to check the process of your vaping by observing the detailed operating data. The upgraded chipset fuels the high performance and puts more peace of mind into the safety protection. Smok Morph 3 is educated into a magnet for the admiration of seasoned lovers. Air-adjustable and leak-proof, the topped T-Air Subtank with the meshed TA series coils make every 5ml of the E-Liquid refilling a taste feast. The quarter-turn top cap and dual filling ports facilitate e-liquid filling process. The newly developed bulb glass tube measures a 32mm in diameter, it guarantees a durable vaping enjoyment, as there’s no need to add the e-liquid frequently. The top airflow system features a dual-slotted design with honeycomb airflow control that shortens the airway and reduces air loss for increased vapor and enhanced flavor. Simply turn the adjustable ring for finer adjustment of airflow from loose to tight. The Smok T-Air Subtank’s drip tip is a standard 810 drip tip with a diameter of 16mm that fits perfectly into your lips. The T-Air tank is available for TA meshed series coils 0.2ohm and 0.4ohm via plug-n-play installation. name: smok-mag-solo-kit
details:
Smok Mag Solo Starter Vape Kit breaks new ground in the box mod series as a symbol of innovation and creativity. In iconic Mag style, it combines glossy zinc alloy and premium scratch-resistant leather for masculinity and elegance. The Mag Solo has a maximum power of 100W and comes standard with a 5ml all-new T-Air Subtank, allowing you to enjoy huge clouds and delectable flavors for a sustainable vaping experience. The Smok Mag Solo Kit can be powered by an external 21700 or 18650 battery (not included) with an adapter, offering great flexibility, portability, and efficiency in term of power supply. A troublesome charging is no less than the torture of time and patience, let alone the inefficient charging. Type-C makes charging as easy as pie, achieving stable and efficient charging. Read real-time vape data directly through the 0.96-inch TFT display. Select a theme color with 6 choices, so it can always match your style of the day. The Mag Solo follows the classic exquisite small fire key, which is like the trigger and you can easily press the triggering button. What’s more, the surface of the keys is smooth and comfortable to touch. The Smok T-Air Subtank is meticulously designed to be completely leak proof. The quarter-turn top cap and dual filling ports facilitate E-Liquid filling process. The top airflow system features a dual-slotted design with honeycomb airflow control that shortens the airway and reduces air loss for increased vapor and enhanced flavor. Simply turn the adjustable ring for finer adjustment of airflow from loose to tight. The T-Air Subtank’s drip tip is a standard 810 drip tip with a diameter of 16mm that fits perfectly into your lips. Calibration:

Turn on the scale.
Press and hold the [M] key untill the LCD display “CAL” , release the [M] key.
Press [M] key again, the display will show “CAL” followed by the required calibration weight value.
Place the required calibration weight on the center of the platform, the display will show “PASS” then return to the normal weighing mode.

Calibration is complete! You can turn off the scale.|

name: snoop-dogg-g-pen-herbal-vaporizer
details:

name: piece-water-solution-12oz
details:
| Piece Water's unique proprietary blend of safe-all- natural mineral, vegetable, and fruit extracts work to prevent resin from forming on your waterpipes, or bubblers. It's 100% All Natural and Absolutely Non-Toxic! Add Piece Water to a clean waterpipe and your piece will remain clean and clear from resin build-up. When you are ready to change your piece water, simply rinse your pipe with tap water and it will be clean! In addition, Piece Water acts as a filter of particulate matter, which makes for cleaner & much smoother hits.| Specifications:

|  |  |  |   Proprietary Blend Of All Natural Mineral, Vegetable, and Fruit Extracts| Size: 12 OZ (355 mL)| Waterpipe Fills Per Bottle: This depends on size of your Waterpipe. A 12" Waterpipe holds roughly 2 OZ (59 mL) of water. In this case, a 12 OZ (355 mL) bottle of Piece Water will have 6 + fills per Waterpipe.| Waterpipe Hits Per Fill: This Depends on user Preference. You can change your Piece Water as often as you like. Piece Water customers report great results remain after 40 hits.| Handcrafted in Small Batches. GET FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $50.00.|  

Piece Water's unique proprietary blend of safe-all- natural mineral, vegetable, and fruit extracts work to prevent resin from forming on your waterpipes, or bubblers. It's 100% All Natural and Absolutely Non-Toxic! Add Piece Water to a clean waterpipe and your piece will remain clean and clear from resin build-up. When you are ready to change your piece water, simply rinse your pipe with tap water and it will be clean! In addition, Piece Water acts as a filter of particulate matter, which makes for cleaner & much smoother hits.

Specifications:



Proprietary Blend Of All Natural Mineral, Vegetable, and Fruit Extracts

 

Size: 12 OZ (355 mL)

 

Waterpipe Fills Per Bottle: This depends on size of your Waterpipe. A 12" Waterpipe holds roughly 2 OZ (59 mL) of water. In this case, a 12 OZ (355 mL) bottle of Piece Water will have 6 + fills per Waterpipe.

 

Waterpipe Hits Per Fill: This Depends on user Preference. You can change your Piece Water as often as you like. Piece Water customers report great results remain after 40 hits.

 

Handcrafted in Small Batches.|

name: smok-novo-master-pod-kit
details:
The Smok Novo Master Kit is a small and flexible vaping solution made for a great experience. This kit has a 1000mAh battery built in, and 30W max, so it lasts a long time. Two modes are designed to fit your different needs: Boost Mode (suitable for those who chase for the intense taste), Standard Mode (suitable for those who are content with the mild taste). There are two ways to vape: Button triggered or auto draw. LED indicator design shows you the real-time battery power. In addition, Smok Novo Master Kit comes with the functions of a childproof lock, top filling system, leak-proof design and airflow control. name: shishaglass-mercury-hookah-bowl
details:
Crafted from premium ceramic, the Mercury Hookah Bowl redefines elegance and performance in the world of hookah accessories. Its shallow, wide design ensures optimal heat distribution for a longer, flavorful smoke. With exceptional heat resistance and compatibility with various hookah setups, this bowl combines sophistication with functionality, enhancing every smoking session with rich, satisfying clouds of shisha.|  | Note: Color may change subjective to stock availability **|  | How to clean:| If you would like to seriously clean your hookah bowl you would need:| Selecting the proper nail polish remover is important. It must include acetone as the first ingredient. Acetone is a powerful substance. It can be purchased by itself and is often used to strip the coating from decks or remove paint. However, don’t use pure acetone. It will most likely strip the clear coat from your bowl and could make the ceramic or clay brittle. If you’re unable to purchase nail polish remover, rubbing alcohol would also work fine.| The tool you use for cleaning after the nail polish remover is important too. Use a sanding tool, such as fine steel wool, a sanding sponge or a plastic sanding pad. Don’t use a Brillo Pad as they are often filled with dry soap which will just be an added headache that doesn’t help much. When selecting a sanding tool, choose only fine tools. Coarser ones will quickly strip the clear coat from your bowl. We would suggest using a plastic sanding pad (available at most hardware stores for less than $1), because it’s inexpensive and will take a very long time to wear out when only used for cleaning hookah supplies.| Soak the bowl| Place the hookah bowl upside down in a circular bowl and slowly pour nail polish remover into the bottom of the bowl. Pour enough liquid in to submerge the top of the bowl. Roughly 1cm – 3cm above the rim. Pouring through the bottom is important as it will force the liquid through the holes, thus loosening whatever may be stuck in there.| Allow the bowl to soak for 3 to 5 minutes.| Finish the Job| Now that the bowl has soaked and the nail polish remove has just about finished its job, remove the bowl and aggressively rub the affected areas of the bowl with the rough cleaning pad.| Do not wet the rough cleaning pad before use. Doing so will dilute the nail polish remover that has clung to the bowl and cause it not to work as well. Most affected areas of the bowl will come clean very easily. Some areas, particularly the top of the spire, may require a little more elbow grease.| After most of the gunk is cleared out, run very hot water through the bottom of the bowl, this will force most of the loosened gunk from inside holes in the spire to come clean—but of course, it’s not going to be quite perfect and you may want to run a pipe cleaner through the holes to get the rest of the gunk out. Finally, rinse the bowl thoroughly to get rid of any left-over nail polish remover.|  |  |   Nail Polish Remover with Acetone
A Rough Cleaning Pad (fine steel wool, sanding sponge, plastic sanding pad)
And you can possibly use a standard pipe cleaner as well GET FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $50.00.| Crafted from premium ceramic, the Mercury Hookah Bowl redefines elegance and performance in the world of hookah accessories. Its shallow, wide design ensures optimal heat distribution for a longer, flavorful smoke. With exceptional heat resistance and compatibility with various hookah setups, this bowl combines sophistication with functionality, enhancing every smoking session with rich, satisfying clouds of shisha.

 

Note: Color may change subjective to stock availability **

 | How to clean:

If you would like to seriously clean your hookah bowl you would need:

Nail Polish Remover with Acetone
A Rough Cleaning Pad (fine steel wool, sanding sponge, plastic sanding pad)
And you can possibly use a standard pipe cleaner as well

Selecting the proper nail polish remover is important. It must include acetone as the first ingredient. Acetone is a powerful substance. It can be purchased by itself and is often used to strip the coating from decks or remove paint. However, don’t use pure acetone. It will most likely strip the clear coat from your bowl and could make the ceramic or clay brittle. If you’re unable to purchase nail polish remover, rubbing alcohol would also work fine.

The tool you use for cleaning after the nail polish remover is important too. Use a sanding tool, such as fine steel wool, a sanding sponge or a plastic sanding pad. Don’t use a Brillo Pad as they are often filled with dry soap which will just be an added headache that doesn’t help much. When selecting a sanding tool, choose only fine tools. Coarser ones will quickly strip the clear coat from your bowl. We would suggest using a plastic sanding pad (available at most hardware stores for less than $1), because it’s inexpensive and will take a very long time to wear out when only used for cleaning hookah supplies.

Soak the bowl

Place the hookah bowl upside down in a circular bowl and slowly pour nail polish remover into the bottom of the bowl. Pour enough liquid in to submerge the top of the bowl. Roughly 1cm – 3cm above the rim. Pouring through the bottom is important as it will force the liquid through the holes, thus loosening whatever may be stuck in there.

Allow the bowl to soak for 3 to 5 minutes.

Finish the Job

Now that the bowl has soaked and the nail polish remove has just about finished its job, remove the bowl and aggressively rub the affected areas of the bowl with the rough cleaning pad.

Do not wet the rough cleaning pad before use. Doing so will dilute the nail polish remover that has clung to the bowl and cause it not to work as well. Most affected areas of the bowl will come clean very easily. Some areas, particularly the top of the spire, may require a little more elbow grease.

After most of the gunk is cleared out, run very hot water through the bottom of the bowl, this will force most of the loosened gunk from inside holes in the spire to come clean—but of course, it’s not going to be quite perfect and you may want to run a pipe cleaner through the holes to get the rest of the gunk out. Finally, rinse the bowl thoroughly to get rid of any left-over nail polish remover.

The tool you use for cleaning after the nail polish remover is important too. Use a sanding tool, such as fine steel wool, a sanding sponge or a plastic sanding pad. Don’t use a Brillo Pad as they are often filled with dry soap which will just be an added headache that doesn’t help much. When selecting a sanding tool, choose only fine tools. Coarser ones will quickly strip the clear coat from your bowl. We would suggest using a plastic sanding pad (available at most hardware stores for less than $1), because it’s inexpensive and will take a very long time to wear out when only used for cleaning hookah supplies.

Soak the bowl

Place the hookah bowl upside down in a circular bowl and slowly pour nail polish remover into the bottom of the bowl. Pour enough liquid in to submerge the top of the bowl. Roughly 1cm – 3cm above the rim. Pouring through the bottom is important as it will force the liquid through the holes, thus loosening whatever may be stuck in there.

Allow the bowl to soak for 3 to 5 minutes.

Finish the Job

Now that the bowl has soaked and the nail polish remove has just about finished its job, remove the bowl and aggressively rub the affected areas of the bowl with the rough cleaning pad.

Do not wet the rough cleaning pad before use. Doing so will dilute the nail polish remover that has clung to the bowl and cause it not to work as well. Most affected areas of the bowl will come clean very easily. Some areas, particularly the top of the spire, may require a little more elbow grease.

After most of the gunk is cleared out, run very hot water through the bottom of the bowl, this will force most of the loosened gunk from inside holes in the spire to come clean—but of course, it’s not going to be quite perfect and you may want to run a pipe cleaner through the holes to get the rest of the gunk out. Finally, rinse the bowl thoroughly to get rid of any left-over nail polish remover.

name: smoka-kush-2-0-mouthpiece
details:
Keep a spare Kush 2.0 Vaporizer mouthpiece with you in case a replacement is needed! This mouthpiece is made with high-quality food-grade material and features a unique, isolated air path known to create clean, smooth vapor. The mouthpiece is built to impress and guarantees the purest vapor. With magnetic connections in place, the mouthpiece easily connects to the vaporizer chamber for user convenience. The part of the mouthpiece where you would place your lips just flips right out for use. name: smoka-kush-2-0-waterpipe-adaptor
details:
This WaterPipe Adaptor from Smoka is for use with the KUSH 2.0 Vaporizer. It can be used with either a 14 or 18mm joint, giving you easy access to more filtered, bigger clouds. The adaptor allows you to take your vapor to the next level, there is nothing quite like the filtration you get from a water pipe. If your water pipe has ice notches, you can really up the anti by adding a handful of ice cubes to your water pipe, ensuring you get that glacier chill added to your vapor. If you have the lung power, you can also create some epic clouds by using the Kush alongside a water pipe.| Includes: 1 x Smoka Kush 2.0 Waterpipe Adaptor GET FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $50.00.| This WaterPipe Adaptor from Smoka is for use with the KUSH 2.0 Vaporizer. Note: Color/Design may change subjective to stock availability | Product descriptions:

Welcome to the new NBT Grinder! This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. We also want you to know that you're getting the new NBT experience so there have been a few more added features to help prevent counterfeiting and improve your overall grinding experience.

Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Razor sharp Diamond Cutting Blades for extreme efficiency. Stainless steel pollen screen allows for only the finest pollen to fall to the bottom catch. Powerful Neodymium Magnets for incredible closure. Thin poly ring around top grinding section, for smooth grinding and no friction. Comes with protective pouch!

Features:

Cool NBT logo design
Pollen filter
Lexan O-ring
Scraper
Strong magnet
Pollen collecting compartment

Package Includes:

1 x NBT Grinder 50mm 4 parts
1 x Drawstring bag

How to use:

Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco/dried herb into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco/dried herb in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco/dried herb

Welcome to the new NBT Grinder! This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. We also want you to know that you're getting the new NBT experience so there have been a few more added features to help prevent counterfeiting and improve your overall grinding experience.

Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Razor sharp Diamond Cutting Blades for extreme efficiency. Stainless steel pollen screen allows for only the finest pollen to fall to the bottom catch. Powerful Neodymium Magnets for incredible closure. Thin poly ring around top grinding section, for smooth grinding and no friction. Comes with protective pouch!

Features:

Cool NBT logo design
Pollen filter
Lexan O-ring
Scraper
Strong magnet
Pollen collecting compartment

Package Includes:

1 x NBT Grinder 63mm 4 parts
1 x Drawstring bag

How to use:

Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco/dried herb into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco/dried herb in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco/dried herb

Welcome to the new NBT Grinder! This re-designed grinder still provides you with the same great features of the original NBT Grinders, but with a few modest upgrades in ergo design and quality. We also want you to know that you're getting the new NBT experience so there have been a few more added features to help prevent counterfeiting and improve your overall grinding experience.

Made from Aircraft Grade Aluminium Rod using the newest in CNC machining technology. Anodized for smooth finish; this means no wear or smudge marks. Razor sharp Diamond Cutting Blades for extreme efficiency. Stainless steel pollen screen allows for only the finest pollen to fall to the bottom catch. Powerful Neodymium Magnets for incredible closure. Thin poly ring around top grinding section, for smooth grinding and no friction. Comes with protective pouch!

Features:

Cool NBT logo design
Pollen filter
Lexan O-ring
Scraper
Strong magnet
Pollen collecting compartment

Package Includes:

1 x NBT Grinder 40mm 3 parts
1 x Drawstring bag

How to use:

Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco/dried herb into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco/dried herb in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco/dried herb

Strong magnet
Pollen collecting compartment

Package Includes:

1 x NBT Grinder 4 parts
1 x Drawstring bag

How to use:

Remove the top lid from the grinder
Break the tobacco/dried herb into piece and evenly distribute them on the grinder teeth (Do not place any tobacco/dried herb in the centre of the grinder teeth as this is where the magnet is that holds the lid in place)
Take the lid of the grinder and place it on top of the grinder teeth so that the centre magnet holds the lid in place
Gently spin the lid for 5-10 times
Now that it is ready, remove the upper two sections of the grinder, this can be done by firmly grasp the base of the grinder with one hand and use your other hand to twist off the top two sections, this will reveal the third section with your grinded tobacco/dried herb

A little will go a long way - there are on average about 16 sprays (3ml) per bottle.

 | EFFECTIVE FOR:

Difficulty achieving and/or maintaining erection
Premature ejaculation
Increase vitality
Promote inspiration
Prolong sexual activities

WARNINGS:

First-time users should not spray too much-- "proper dosage" depends on the individual, and starting with a small amount allows the user to figure this out without "overdoing" it.

For external use only.
Please keep away from children.

HOW TO USE:

Open the outer metal casing.
Spray a thin layer of the lotion to the penis head area externally.
Wait approximately 30 minutes for the lotion to be absorbed through the skin and its effects to become fully evident.
If you desire a greater effect, you can reapply the lotion.
After 30 mins you can gently wash any excess off the penis before intercourse. (you do not have to)
The spray vessel must remain vertical while spraying or the product will not dispense correctly and will not be effective.

INGREDIENTS:

Active Ingredients: Isopropyl Alcohol, Fragrances, Water, Conidium Seeds.
Inactive Ingredients: Peppermint Oil, Cinnamon, Tea Oil, Licorice, and Scutellaria Root.

DISCLAIMER: The manufacturer uses oversized bottles, and the liquid may look like it's filled halfway or less. This is due to manufacturing limitations due to the unique spray bottle and delicate herbal liquid.

details:

Operating on a single 18650 battery (not included), this kit allows for easy battery replacement, enabling extended vaping sessions without the need for frequent recharges.| Specifications:| Includes:  GET FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER $50.00.| Quick Links:Vaporesso GTi Replacement Coils
Vaporesso iTank T Replacement Glass Tube
Advanced Upgrade to the GEN SeriesThe Vaporesso GEN SE Kit with the new iTank T is a notable upgrade in the GEN series. Operating on a single 18650 battery (not included), this kit allows for easy battery replacement, enabling extended vaping sessions without the need for frequent recharges.

Versatile Output PowerThe Vaporesso GEN SE offers an output range from 5 to 80 watts, accommodating a variety of vaping styles and preferences. Whether you prefer mild or intense vapor production, you can adjust the device to meet your needs.
Innovative DisplayFeaturing a 0.96" TFT screen, the GEN SE kit delivers a crisp and clear display. Users can select from three different display themes, personalizing the interface for an enhanced user experience.
Introducing the New iTank TIncluded with the kit is the new iTank T, which boasts an adjustable top-airflow and a top-to-bottom airflow intake system. This design optimizes flavor and ensures smooth and consistent draws, enhancing the overall vaping experience.
E-liquid Self-circulating SystemThe GEN SE features an e-liquid self-circulating system that recycles condensation, re-vaporizing it to minimize leaks and maximize e-liquid efficiency.
Convenient Refilling SystemRefilling the tank is made easy with the slide-to-open top refilling system, which prevents mess and spillage, making the process quick and clean.
AXON ChipsetAt the core of the GEN SE is the AXON chipset, boosting power and supporting various modes, including a default pulse mode. This mode ensures stable output, delivering consistent and high-quality flavor from the first puff to the last.
Essential Safety FeaturesThe device includes essential safety features such as a side lock button to prevent accidental misfires. Additionally, an all-in-one fire button not only fires the device but also adjusts settings, simplifying operation.
Ideal for Sub-ohm DTL VapingThe GEN SE is perfect for sub-ohm direct-to-lung vaping, providing intense flavor and dense vapor production. This style is particularly suited for experienced vapers who enjoy creating large clouds of vapor.
Compatibility with GTi CoilsThis vape kit is compatible with GTi coils, including the 0.2ohm and 0.4ohm mesh coils. These coils utilize COREX 2.0 technology with upgraded cotton, significantly enhancing flavor and vapor production.

Specifications:

name: new-cuba-toro-cigar-6x50
details:
Casa Fernandez is one of the largest growers of tobacco in Nicaragua. Today’s hot-bed for best of the best, Nicaragua’s black volcanic soils and tropical climate equal the perfect recipe for delicious offerings, and Casa Fernandez has there hand in countless boutique fan favorites hailing from their pristine Nicaraguan farms. The cigar at hand caters to the everyday enthusiast while utilizing Casa Fernandez’s revered, Cuban-esque proprietary tobaccos.| New Cuba is rich and full-flavored, yet still perfectly smooth. A golden-brown Corojo wrapper and a ‘Cuban sandwich’ blend of Cuban-seed Nicaraguan tobaccos leads to an enjoyable profile brimming with notes of earth, pepper, nuts, and cocoa. Boasting a complex character and a cool, slow burn.| Size: 6"| Gauge: 50mm| | This product is only available for NZ customers. details:
Introducing the Aganorsa Leaf New Cuba Superior, elevating the renowned New Cuba line to a premium level. Crafted with Nicaraguan long-fillers enveloped in a Nicaraguan Cuban-seed binder, this cigar boasts a luxurious Ecuadorian Connecticut-Shade wrapper, exuding a smooth, golden hue. Grown in Aganorsa Leaf's own Nicaraguan farms across Condega, Esteli, and Jalapa, the Nicaraguan tobaccos ensure top-notch quality.
